p: Serial passage of USUV in the presence of each ribonucleoside drug led to sustained decreases in virus titers but not to complete viral extinction ( Fig. 6A). Virus lineages treated with ribonucleosides showed significantly lower titers (3 to 4 log 10 on average) than during passages in decitabine or in the absence of drug. The lowest values were observed in the presence of 5-fluorouracil, further suggesting that this compound is most effective against USUV during serial passage in cell culture ( Fig. 6A).
